author: The Messenger
title: Ground News - Sen. Graham Says Chick-Fil-A Can Close on Sunday 'If You Can Have a Satan Club in High School'
text:
Summary by The Messenger ‘It’s illegal what they’re trying to do, trying to make Chick-fil-A stay open on Sunday violates their constitutional rights,’ Graham said Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
Mediaite Lean Left Mixed Factuality Individual: Dan Abrams Lindsey Graham Declares That With Satan in High School, Chick-Fil-A Should Be Able to Close on Sunday: ‘This Is God’s Chicken!’ Senator Lindsey Graham (R-SC) railed against a bill making its way through the New York state legislature aimed at forcing the fast food chain Chick-fil-A to open its s rest stop locations on Sunday, during a Wednesday morning appearance on Fox & Friends, comparing the closures favorably to the promotion of after-school Satan clubs in public schools. In a Wednesday morning appearance on Fox & Friends, Graham declared that “if you can have a Sat…
